/* indvdlClmMapper.retrieveVcatnStrgInfoInq */ SELECT 'ACCOUNT' TYPE /* 회계_신규휴가 구분 */ ,VCATN_ALTMNT_SN /* 휴가배정순번 */ ,EMP_ID /* 직원ID */ ,VCATN_YR /* 휴가연도 */ ,VCATN_ALTMNT_DAYCNT /* 휴가배정일수 */ ,USE_DAYCNT /* 사용일수 */ ,PBLEN_VCATN_USE_DAYCNT /* 공적휴가사용일수 */ ,VCATN_REMNDR_DAYCNT /* 휴가잔여일수 */ ,NEW_VCATN_ALTMNT_DAYCNT /* 신규휴가배정일수 */ ,NEW_USE_DAYCNT /* 신규사용일수 */ ,NEW_REMNDR_DAYCNT /* 신규잔여일수 */ ,ALTMNT_BGNG_YMD /* 배정시작일자 */ ,ALTMNT_USE_END_YMD /* 배정사용종료일자 */ FROM VCATN_MNG WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId} AND #{vcatnBgngYmd} BETWEEN ALTMNT_BGNG_YMD AND ALTMNT_USE_END_YMD
AND NEW_VCATN_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT 'NEW' /* 회계_신규휴가 구분 */ ,VCATN_ALTMNT_SN /* 휴가배정순번 */ ,EMP_ID /* 직원ID */ ,VCATN_YR /* 휴가연도 */ ,VCATN_ALTMNT_DAYCNT /* 휴가배정일수 */ ,USE_DAYCNT /* 사용일수 */ ,PBLEN_VCATN_USE_DAYCNT /* 공적휴가사용일수 */ ,VCATN_REMNDR_DAYCNT /* 휴가잔여일수 */ ,NEW_VCATN_ALTMNT_DAYCNT /* 신규휴가배정일수 */ ,NEW_USE_DAYCNT /* 신규사용일수 */ ,NEW_REMNDR_DAYCNT /* 신규잔여일수 */ ,ALTMNT_BGNG_YMD /* 배정시작일자 */ ,ALTMNT_USE_END_YMD /* 배정사용종료일자 */ FROM VCATN_MNG WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId} AND #{vcatnBgngYmd} BETWEEN ALTMNT_BGNG_YMD AND ALTMNT_USE_END_YMD AND NEW_VCATN_YN = 'Y'

/* indvdlClmMapper.retrieveAtchmnflInq */ SELECT ATCHMNFL_ID /* 첨부파일ID */ ,ATCHMNFL_SN /* 첨부파일순번 */ ,STRG_FILE_NM /* 저장파일명 */ ,REAL_FILE_NM /* 실제파일명 */ ,FILE_STRG_COURS /* 파일저장경로 */ FROM ATCHMNFL WHERE ATCHMNFL_ID = #{atchmnflId}

/* indvdlClmMapper.retrieveAtrzLnAprvListInq */ WITH RECURSIVE DEPT_LINE AS ( SELECT DEPT_ID, DEPT_NM, UP_DEPT_ID, 0 AS LEVEL FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID = #{deptId} AND END_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT DEPT2.DEPT_ID, DEPT2.DEPT_NM, DEPT2.UP_DEPT_ID, LINE.LEVEL + 1 AS LEVEL FROM DEPT DEPT2 INNER JOIN DEPT_LINE LINE ON DEPT2.DEPT_ID = LINE.UP_DEPT_ID ) SELECT DEPT_ID
FROM DEPT_LINE DL

/* indvdlClmMapper.retrieveElctrnAtrzRefrnInq */ SELECT EMP.EMP_ID ,EMP.EMPNO ,EMP_FLNM ,JBPS_CD ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = JBPS_CD) JBPS_NM ,DEPT.DEPT_ID ,DEPT.DEPT_NM ,CONCAT(DEPT_NM, ' ', EMP_FLNM, ' ', (SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = EMP.JBPS_CD)) LIST_EMP_FLNM ,'VTW00706' APPROVAL_CODE FROM EMP EMP ,DEPT DEPT ,DEPT_HNF HNF WHERE HDOF_STTS_CD = 'VTW00301' AND EMP.EMP_ID = HNF.EMP_ID AND DEPT.DEPT_ID = HNF.DEPT_ID AND DEPT.DEPT_ID = #{repDeptId} AND EMP.EMP_FLNM IN ('이진원', '안주리') ORDER BY EMPNO

/* indvdlClmMapper.retrievePrjctIndvdlCtAply */ WITH RECURSIVE VCATN_CNT AS ( SELECT ATRZ.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID ,EMP.EMP_ID ,ATRZ.VCATN_BGNG_YMD AS VCATN_YMD ,ATRZ.VCATN_TY_CD ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = ATRZ.VCATN_TY_CD) AS VCATN_TY_NM ,CASE WHEN ATRZ.VCATN_TY_CD IN ('VTW01201', 'VTW01204') THEN '8hrs' ELSE '4hrs' END VCATN_TIME ,ATRZ.VCATN_DE_CNT AS FLAG_CNT FROM VCATN_ATRZ ATRZ ,ELCTRN_ATRZ ELCTRN ,EMP EMP WHERE ATRZ.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = ELCTRN.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID AND ELCTRN.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID AND ATRZ.VCATN_TY_CD != 'VTW01207' AND ELCTRN.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' AND ELCTRN.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID = #{empId} AND SUBSTR(ATRZ.VCATN_BGNG_YMD, 1, 6) = #{aplyYm} UNION ALL SELECT ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID ,EMP_ID ,VCATN_YMD + 1 ,VCATN_TY_CD ,VCATN_TY_NM ,VCATN_TIME ,FLAG_CNT - 1 FROM VCATN_CNT WHERE 1 < FLAG_CNT ) SELECT 'workAply' APLY_TYPE /* 근무_휴가구분식별자 */ ,ATRZ.PRJCT_ID /* 프로젝트ID */ ,(SELECT PRJCT_NM FROM PRJCT PRJCT WHERE PRJCT.PRJCT_ID = ATRZ.PRJCT_ID) PRJCT_NM /* 프로젝트명 */ ,ATRZ.EMP_ID /* 직원ID */ ,ATRZ.APLY_YM /* 신청연월 */ ,ATRZ.APLY_ODR /* 신청차수 */ ,ATRZ.APLY_YMD /* 신청일자 */ ,ROUND(APLY.MD, 1) MD /* 근무시간비율 */ ,ATRZ.RJCT_PRVONSH /* 반려사유 */ ,ATRZ.PRJCT_APRVR_CD /* 프로젝트결재자코드 */ ,ATRZ.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD /* 결재요청상태코드 */ ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD) ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD_NM /* 결재요청상태코드명 */ ,ATRZ.APRVR_EMP_ID /* 결재자직원ID */ ,(SELECT EMP_FLNM FROM EMP EMP WHERE EMP.EMP_ID = APRVR_EMP_ID) APRVR_EMP_FLNM /* 결재자직원명 */ ,ATRZ.APRV_YMD /* 승인일자 */ ,ATRZ.RJCT_YMD /* 반려일자 */ ,'' VCATN_TY_CD /* 휴가유형코드 */ ,CONCAT( ROUND(md * 8), '시간 | ', (SELECT PRJCT_NM FROM PRJCT PRJCT WHERE PRJCT.PRJCT_ID = ATRZ.PRJCT_ID), '', IFNULL((SELECT EMP_FLNM FROM EMP EMP WHERE EMP.EMP_ID = APRVR_EMP_ID), ''), ' ', IFNULL((SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD), '') ) TEXT /* 결재상태내용 */ FROM PRJCT_MM_ATRZ ATRZ ,PRJCT_MM_APLY APLY WHERE 1 = 1 AND ATRZ.PRJCT_ID = APLY.PRJCT_ID AND ATRZ.EMP_ID = APLY.EMP_ID AND ATRZ.APLY_YM = APLY.APLY_YM AND ATRZ.APLY_ODR = APLY.APLY_ODR AND ATRZ.APLY_YMD = APLY.APLY_YMD AND ATRZ.EMP_ID = #{empId} AND ATRZ.APLY_YM = #{aplyYm}
UNION ALL SELECT 'vcatnAply' APLY_TYPE /* 근무_휴가구분식별자 */ ,'' ,'' ,EMP_ID ,'' ,'' ,VCATN_YMD ,CASE WHEN VCATN_TY_CD IN ('VTW01201', 'VTW01204') THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.5 END ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,VCATN_TY_CD ,CONCAT(VCATN_TY_NM, ' ', VCATN_TIME) FROM VCATN_CNT
mapper.insert: /* indvdlClmMapper.retrievePrjctMmAplyStrg */ INSERT INTO PRJCT_MM_APLY VALUES ( #{prjctId}, #{empId}, #{aplyYm}, #{aplyOdr}, #{md}, #{aplyYmd}, SYSDATE(), #{empId}, SYSDATE(), #{empId}, #{yrycRate} ,(SELECT USER_DFN_VALUE FROM CD CD WHERE CD.CD_VALUE = #{jbpsCd}) )
mapper.select: /* indvdlClmMapper.retrievePrjctMmAtrzRtrcn */ SELECT ATRZ.PRJCT_ID ,ATRZ.EMP_ID ,ATRZ.APLY_YM ,ATRZ.APLY_ODR ,ATRZ.APLY_YMD FROM PRJCT_MM_ATRZ ATRZ ,PRJCT_MM_APLY APLY WHERE ATRZ.EMP_ID = APLY.EMP_ID AND ATRZ.APLY_YM = APLY.APLY_YM AND ATRZ.APLY_ODR = APLY.APLY_ODR AND ATRZ.APLY_YMD = APLY.APLY_YMD AND ATRZ.PRJCT_ID = APLY.PRJCT_ID AND ATRZ.EMP_ID = #{empId} AND (ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = '' OR ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD IS NULL OR ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03704')

/* indvdlClmMapper.retrieveMnbyYmdInq */ SELECT CRTR_YMD /* 일자 */ ,CRTR_ODR /* 차수 */ ,HLDY_CL_CD /* 일자종류코드 */ ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = CRTR_DATE.HLDY_CL_CD) HLDY_CL_NM /* 일자종류명 */ ,HLDY_NM /* 공휴일명 */ ,RM /* 내용 */ FROM CRTR_DATE WHERE SUBSTR(CRTR_YMD, 1, 6) = #{aplyYm}

/* indvdlClmMapper.retrieveVcatnYearInfoInq */ SELECT CRTR_YMD /* 일자 */ ,CRTR_ODR /* 차수 */ ,HLDY_CL_CD /* 일자종류코드 */ ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = CRTR_DATE.HLDY_CL_CD) HLDY_CL_NM /* 일자종류명 */ ,HLDY_NM /* 공휴일명 */ ,RM /* 내용 */ FROM CRTR_DATE WHERE SUBSTR(CRTR_YMD, 1, 4) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y') - 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y') + 1 AND HLDY_CL_CD = 'VTW05003'

/* indvdlClmMapper.retrieveVcatnPrjctMmYnInq */ SELECT DATE_FORMAT(APLY_YMD, '%Y-%m-%d') APLY_YMD /* 신청일자 */ ,ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD /* 결재요청상태코드 */ ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD) ATRZ_DMND_STTS_NM /* 결재요청상태코드명 */ ,MM_ATRZ_CMPTN_YN /* MM결재완료여부 */ FROM PRJCT_MM_ATRZ ATRZ ,PRJCT_INDVDL_CT_MM INDVDL WHERE ATRZ.EMP_ID = INDVDL.EMP_ID AND ATRZ.EMP_ID = #{empId} AND APLY_YMD BETWEEN #{vcatnBgngYmd} AND #{vcatnEndYmd}

/* indvdlClmMapper.retrieveVcatnUseKndInq */ WITH RECURSIVE VCATN_LIST AS( SELECT CASE WHEN NEW_VCATN_YN = 'Y' THEN 'NEW' ELSE 'ACCOUNT' END VCATN_FLAG ,DATE_FORMAT(#{vcatnBgngYmd}, '%Y%m%d') AS FLAG_DATE ,VCATN_ALTMNT_SN /* 휴가배정순번 */ ,EMP_ID /* 직원ID */ ,VCATN_YR /* 휴가연도 */ ,VCATN_ALTMNT_DAYCNT /* 휴가배정일수 */ ,USE_DAYCNT /* 사용일수 */ ,PBLEN_VCATN_USE_DAYCNT /* 공적휴가사용일수 */ ,VCATN_REMNDR_DAYCNT /* 휴가잔여일수 */ ,NEW_VCATN_ALTMNT_DAYCNT /* 신규휴가배정일수 */ ,NEW_USE_DAYCNT /* 신규사용일수 */ ,NEW_REMNDR_DAYCNT /* 신규잔여일수 */ ,ALTMNT_BGNG_YMD /* 배정시작일자 */ ,ALTMNT_USE_END_YMD /* 배정사용종료일자 */ ,NEW_VCATN_YN FROM VCATN_MNG WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId} AND (DATE_FORMAT(#{vcatnBgngYmd}, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN ALTMNT_BGNG_YMD AND ALTMNT_USE_END_YMD OR DATE_FORMAT(#{vcatnEndYmd}, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN ALTMNT_BGNG_YMD AND ALTMNT_USE_END_YMD) UNION ALL SELECT VCATN_FLAG ,DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(FLAG_DATE, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d') ,VCATN_ALTMNT_SN /* 휴가배정순번 */ ,EMP_ID /* 직원ID */ ,VCATN_YR /* 휴가연도 */ ,VCATN_ALTMNT_DAYCNT /* 휴가배정일수 */ ,USE_DAYCNT /* 사용일수 */ ,PBLEN_VCATN_USE_DAYCNT /* 공적휴가사용일수 */ ,VCATN_REMNDR_DAYCNT /* 휴가잔여일수 */ ,NEW_VCATN_ALTMNT_DAYCNT /* 신규휴가배정일수 */ ,NEW_USE_DAYCNT /* 신규사용일수 */ ,NEW_REMNDR_DAYCNT /* 신규잔여일수 */ ,ALTMNT_BGNG_YMD /* 배정시작일자 */ ,ALTMNT_USE_END_YMD /* 배정사용종료일자 */ ,NEW_VCATN_YN FROM VCATN_LIST WHERE FLAG_DATE < #{vcatnEndYmd} ) SELECT * FROM VCATN_LIST VLIST ,CRTR_DATE CRTR WHERE (DATE_FORMAT(FLAG_DATE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN ALTMNT_BGNG_YMD AND ALTMNT_USE_END_YMD) AND CRTR.CRTR_YMD = FLAG_DATE AND CRTR.HLDY_CL_CD = 'VTW05001' ORDER BY NEW_VCATN_YN, FLAG_DATE

SELECT EXPENS_CD, (SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = ep.EXPENS_CD) AS CD_NM FROM EXPENS_PRMPC ep WHERE 1 = 1
AND PRJCT_ID = #{prjctId}

SELECT pcatd.ATND_EMP_ID FROM nwTr.PRJCT_CT_APLY pca JOIN nwTr.PRJCT_CT_ATRZ pcaz ON pca.PRJCT_CT_APLY_SN = pcaz.PRJCT_CT_APLY_SN AND pca.EMP_ID = pcaz.EMP_ID AND pca.APLY_YM = pcaz.APLY_YM AND pca.APLY_ODR = pcaz.APLY_ODR JOIN nwTr.PRJCT_CT_ATDRN pcatd ON pca.PRJCT_CT_APLY_SN = pcatd.PRJCT_CT_APLY_SN WHERE 1 = 1 AND pca.EXPENS_CD = 'VTW04531' AND SUBSTR(pca.UTZTN_DT, 1, 8) = SUBSTR(#{utztnDt}, 1, 8);

SELECT EMP_ID , CLTUR_PHSTRN_ACT_CT_SN , CLM_YMD , CLM_AMT , ACT_IEM , CLTUR_PHSTRN_SE_CD , ACT_PURPS , FRCS_NM , RM , c.ATCHMNFL_ID , a.ATCHMNFL_SN , a.REAL_FILE_NM , a.STRG_FILE_NM FROM CLTUR_PHSTRN_ACT_CT_REG c LEFT JOIN ATCHMNFL a ON c.ATCHMNFL_ID = a.ATCHMNFL_ID WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId} AND CLM_YMD LIKE CONCAT(#{clmYmd}, '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE PRJCT_CT_ATRZ JOIN PRJCT_CT_APLY ON PRJCT_CT_ATRZ.PRJCT_CT_APLY_SN = PRJCT_CT_APLY.PRJCT_CT_APLY_SN AND PRJCT_CT_ATRZ.EMP_ID = PRJCT_CT_APLY.EMP_ID AND PRJCT_CT_ATRZ.PRJCT_ID = PRJCT_CT_APLY.PRJCT_ID AND PRJCT_CT_ATRZ.APLY_YM = PRJCT_CT_APLY.APLY_YM AND PRJCT_CT_ATRZ.APLY_ODR = PRJCT_CT_APLY.APLY_ODR SET PRJCT_CT_ATRZ.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = CASE WHEN #{actionType} = 'INPUT' THEN 'VTW03701' WHEN #{actionType} = 'INPUT_CANCEL' THEN NULL WHEN #{actionType} = 'APPROVE' THEN 'VTW03702' WHEN #{actionType} = 'APPROVE_CANCEL' THEN 'VTW03701' END, PRJCT_CT_ATRZ.MDFCN_DT = now(), PRJCT_CT_ATRZ.MDFCN_EMP_ID = #{empId} WHERE 1=1 AND ( (#{actionType} = 'INPUT' AND ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD IS NULL) OR (#{actionType} = 'INPUT_CANCEL' AND ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03701') OR (#{actionType} = 'APPROVE' AND ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03701') OR (#{actionType} = 'APPROVE_CANCEL' AND ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD IN ('VTW03702', 'VTW03704')) ) AND PRJCT_CT_ATRZ.EMP_ID = #{empId} AND PRJCT_CT_ATRZ.APLY_YM = #{aplyYm} AND PRJCT_CT_ATRZ.APLY_ODR = #{aplyOdr} AND PRJCT_CT_APLY.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS TOT_CNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN pcaz.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS CT_REG , COUNT(CASE WHEN pcaz.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03701' THEN 1 END) AS INPT_DDLN , COUNT(CASE WHEN pcaz.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03702' THEN 1 END) AS APRV_DMND , COUNT(CASE WHEN pcaz.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' THEN 1 END) AS APRV , COUNT(CASE WHEN pcaz.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03704' THEN 1 END) AS RJCT , COUNT(CASE WHEN pcaz.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03705' THEN 1 END) AS APRV_RTRCN FROM PRJCT_CT_APLY pca JOIN PRJCT_CT_ATRZ pcaz ON pca.PRJCT_CT_APLY_SN = pcaz.PRJCT_CT_APLY_SN AND pca.EMP_ID = pcaz.EMP_ID AND pca.APLY_YM = pcaz.APLY_YM AND pca.APLY_ODR = pcaz.APLY_ODR WHERE pca.EMP_ID = #{empId} AND pca.APLY_YM = #{aplyYm} AND pca.APLY_ODR = #{aplyOdr} AND pca.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID, ea.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID, ea.PRJCT_ID, ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_TY_SE_CD, ea.NOW_ATRZ_LN_SN FROM ELCTRN_ATRZ ea LEFT JOIN CLM_ATRZ ca ON ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = ca.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND ea.PRJCT_ID = #{prjctId} AND ea.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID = #{empId} AND ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId}

SELECT e.EMPNO, EMP_FLNM, d.DEPT_NM, (SELECT CD_NM FROM CD c WHERE CD_VALUE = e.JBPS_CD) AS JBPS_NM FROM EMP e JOIN DEPT_HNF dh ON e.EMP_ID = dh.EMP_ID JOIN DEPT d ON dh.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID WHERE e.EMP_ID = #{empId}

SELECT CONCAT(COUNT(*), '개') AS TOTAL_COUNT, FORMAT(SUM(pca.UTZTN_AMT), 0) AS TOTAL_UTZTN_AMT FROM PRJCT_CT_ATRZ pcrz JOIN PRJCT_CT_APLY pca ON pcrz.PRJCT_CT_APLY_SN = pca.PRJCT_CT_APLY_SN AND pcrz.EMP_ID = pca.EMP_ID AND pcrz.PRJCT_ID = pca.PRJCT_ID AND pcrz.APLY_YM = pca.APLY_YM AND pcrz.APLY_ODR = pca.APLY_ODR WHERE 1=1 AND pcrz.APLY_YM = #{aplyYm} AND pcrz.EMP_ID = #{empId} AND pcrz.APLY_ODR = #{aplyOdr} AND pcrz.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703'

SELECT ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(MD) * 8, 0) AS MD FROM PRJCT_MM_APLY pma JOIN ( SELECT pmrz.PRJCT_ID, pmrz.EMP_ID, pmrz.APLY_YM, pmrz.APLY_ODR FROM PRJCT_MM_ATRZ pmrz WHERE pmrz.EMP_ID = #{empId} AND pmrz.APLY_YM = #{aplyYm} AND pmrz.APLY_ODR = #{aplyOdr} AND pmrz.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' GROUP BY pmrz.PRJCT_ID, pmrz.EMP_ID, pmrz.APLY_YM, pmrz.APLY_ODR ) filtered ON pma.PRJCT_ID = filtered.PRJCT_ID AND pma.EMP_ID = filtered.EMP_ID AND pma.APLY_YM = filtered.APLY_YM AND pma.APLY_ODR = filtered.APLY_ODR ) + COALESCE(( -- 공휴일 수 SELECT COUNT(*) * 8 FROM CRTR_DATE WHERE SUBSTR(CRTR_YMD, 1, 6) = #{aplyYm} AND HLDY_CL_CD = 'VTW05003' AND CASE WHEN #{aplyOdr} = 1 THEN SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(CRTR_YMD, '%Y%m%d'), 7, 2) BETWEEN '01' AND '15' ELSE SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(CRTR_YMD, '%Y%m%d'), 7, 2) BETWEEN '16' AND '31' END ), 0) + COALESCE(( -- 연차 사용 일수 SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN dv.VCATN_TY_CD IN ('VTW01201', 'VTW01204') THEN 8 ELSE 4 END) AS MD FROM (
WITH RECURSIVE DAILY_VACATION AS ( SELECT VAC.VCATN_TY_CD, (SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = VAC.VCATN_TY_CD) AS PRJCT_NM, DATE(VAC.VCATN_BGNG_YMD) as dt, DATE(VAC.VCATN_END_YMD) as end_dt, ELC.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID FROM ELCTRN_ATRZ ELC JOIN VCATN_ATRZ VAC ON ELC.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = VAC.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID WHERE 1=1 AND ELC.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID = #{empId} AND ELC.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' AND VAC.VCATN_TY_CD != 'VTW01207' UNION ALL SELECT dr.VCATN_TY_CD, dr.PRJCT_NM, DATE_ADD(dr.dt, INTERVAL 1 DAY) as dt, dr.end_dt, dr.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID FROM DAILY_VACATION dr WHERE dr.dt < dr.end_dt ) SELECT VCATN_TY_CD, PRJCT_NM , dt , DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y%m%d') AS APLY_YMD , ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID FROM DAILY_VACATION WHERE SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y%m%d'), 1, 6) = #{aplyYm} AND CASE WHEN #{aplyOdr} = 1 THEN SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y%m%d'), 7, 2) BETWEEN '01' AND '15' ELSE SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y%m%d'), 7, 2) BETWEEN '16' AND '31' END ) dv JOIN CRTR_DATE crd ON crd.CRTR_YMD = dv.APLY_YMD AND crd.HLDY_CL_CD = 'VTW05001' ), 0) AS TOT_TIME

SELECT p.PRJCT_NM, SUBSTRING(DATE_FORMAT(pma.APLY_YMD, '%Y%m%d'), 7, 2) AS APLY_DAY, pma.MD * 8 AS MD FROM PRJCT_MM_APLY pma JOIN PRJCT p ON p.PRJCT_ID = pma.PRJCT_ID JOIN ( SELECT pmrz.PRJCT_ID, pmrz.EMP_ID, pmrz.APLY_YM, pmrz.APLY_ODR FROM PRJCT_MM_ATRZ pmrz WHERE pmrz.EMP_ID = #{empId} AND pmrz.APLY_YM = #{aplyYm} AND pmrz.APLY_ODR = #{aplyOdr} AND pmrz.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' GROUP BY pmrz.PRJCT_ID, pmrz.EMP_ID, pmrz.APLY_YM, pmrz.APLY_ODR ) filtered ON pma.PRJCT_ID = filtered.PRJCT_ID AND pma.EMP_ID = filtered.EMP_ID AND pma.APLY_YM = filtered.APLY_YM AND pma.APLY_ODR = filtered.APLY_ODR

SELECT (SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = CRTR_DATE.HLDY_CL_CD) AS PRJCT_NM, SUBSTRING(DATE_FORMAT(CRTR_YMD, '%Y%m%d'), 7, 2) AS APLY_DAY, 8 AS MD FROM CRTR_DATE WHERE SUBSTR(CRTR_YMD, 1, 6) = #{aplyYm} AND HLDY_CL_CD = 'VTW05003' AND ( (#{aplyOdr} = 1 AND SUBSTRING(DATE_FORMAT(CRTR_YMD, '%Y%m%d'), 7, 2) BETWEEN '01' AND '15') OR (#{aplyOdr} = 2 AND SUBSTRING(DATE_FORMAT(CRTR_YMD, '%Y%m%d'), 7, 2) >= '16') )

SELECT dv.PRJCT_NM , SUBSTRING(DATE_FORMAT(APLY_YMD, '%Y%m%d'), 7, 2) AS APLY_DAY , CASE WHEN dv.VCATN_TY_CD IN ('VTW01201', 'VTW01204') THEN 8 ELSE 4 END AS MD FROM (
WITH RECURSIVE DAILY_VACATION AS ( SELECT VAC.VCATN_TY_CD, (SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = VAC.VCATN_TY_CD) AS PRJCT_NM, DATE(VAC.VCATN_BGNG_YMD) as dt, DATE(VAC.VCATN_END_YMD) as end_dt, ELC.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID FROM ELCTRN_ATRZ ELC JOIN VCATN_ATRZ VAC ON ELC.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = VAC.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID WHERE 1=1 AND ELC.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID = #{empId} AND ELC.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' AND VAC.VCATN_TY_CD != 'VTW01207' UNION ALL SELECT dr.VCATN_TY_CD, dr.PRJCT_NM, DATE_ADD(dr.dt, INTERVAL 1 DAY) as dt, dr.end_dt, dr.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID FROM DAILY_VACATION dr WHERE dr.dt < dr.end_dt ) SELECT VCATN_TY_CD, PRJCT_NM , dt , DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y%m%d') AS APLY_YMD , ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID FROM DAILY_VACATION WHERE SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y%m%d'), 1, 6) = #{aplyYm} AND CASE WHEN #{aplyOdr} = 1 THEN SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y%m%d'), 7, 2) BETWEEN '01' AND '15' ELSE SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y%m%d'), 7, 2) BETWEEN '16' AND '31' END ) dv JOIN CRTR_DATE crd ON crd.CRTR_YMD = dv.APLY_YMD AND crd.HLDY_CL_CD = 'VTW05001';
